EmailTemplate.name: VinWorx KC Fall 2012 Last Chance Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: VinWorx 'cheep' rates extended - last week to register
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Did you miss early-bird registration to next week's VinWorx User Summit? I have good news - we have extended our 'cheep' $399 rate!
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
But you must hurry. Tickets are selling out fast and you only have this week to register for this event:
When: November 5th - 7th, 2012
Where: Kansas City, MO - right in VinSolutions' back yard
What: VinWorx is a networking and advanced certification summit for MotoSnap users. A hands-on workshop, held under the VinUniversity umbrella, attendees will have the opportunity to participate in specialized sessions to train on new and existing integrated product solutions.
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
* Save time and money through FastTrax Motosnap Certification.
* Benefit from the 1:1 consultation and the expert attention you will receive from Jim Nelson, Kendall Billman and their management staffs.
* Benefit from the REAL value of peer-to-peer collaboration, including exclusive workshops led by select VinSolution's Dealers Advisory Board super-user members!
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
* Local dealership with no need for a hotel stay? Contact us for a 'NOSTAY' discount!
* DAB dealership with 1 free registration to redeem? Contact us for your 'VIP' discount!
Any questions, feel free to contact: gina.reuscher@vinsolutions.com
We hope to see you there! Sincerely, Your dedicated VinCare Team
